description.ko: 대양의 압력이 살아있는 생물 발광의 보석을 만들어내는 침묵과 빛의 안식처.
description.en: A sanctuary of silence and light where the pressure of the ocean creates jewels of living bioluminescence.

prompt: A deep-sea cathedral formed by spiraling crystalline coral structures, filled with swirling, bioluminescent plankton clouds and sharp caustic light patterns projected from the surface. Detailed fluid simulation with rising bubbles and translucent jellyfish bells that pulse with turquoise light. 8k, Octane Render, raytraced caustics. Focus on the deep-sea translucency and the intricate textures of the coral walls. Volumetric underwater lighting creates a peaceful yet mysterious dance of light and shadow in the high-pressure depths.
